snippet.title: Intellivision Gameplay - Demon Attack
snippet.description:
A good example of a game better on Atari 2600.

While the Intellivision looks better (that is, depending on who you ask) and has a boss, it's by no means a better game than the cult classic Atari 2600 version. For one, the game is far cheaper, with both its enemies and when the player respawns. The controls are not the best either. Slightly pressing diagonal on the disc pad stops the ship, which is very annoying.

Stick to Atari on this one.
